Articles.Content:
A Probodobodobodyne OKTO2 attached to a Mammoth engine, with internal fuel producers, and fuel lines flow it back into the engines. And also 20,000 graphene heat shields.

It was launched on April 22, 2016 at 4:03PM GMT+1 BST from the KSC.

After 40 minutes, it was travelling at 628 km/s!

Mission Timeline:

4:03PM: launch

4:35PM(?): 500 km/s

4:45PM: 625 km/s

Current Speed (4:46PM) 660 km/s (43 minutes)

Accelerating at about 125-150m/s(?) per second, it is due to be deactivated at 3,000 to 10,000 km/s

Updates:

57 minutes: 900 km/s

Edited April 22, 2016 by Kaizen
